content:
In the intercepted telephone conversation from the Gayvoron of the Belgorod region, the occupiers discuss the instruction to remove the letter "Z" from the working car, since the symbolism of the Russian invasion causes concern and hostility among the local population.

About thisinformsMain Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

“Listen what you need to do tomorrow: come to work on the UAZ without letters“ z ”. Because nobody with you ... I am making comments, no one wants to go to work with you either in Craneo, or Kozinka, nowhere, ” - the boss is inward, who was poured on“ Svo ”, Pdelllom.

The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reminds that all those involved in military crimes are doomed to a fair retribution.

As reported by the Armyinform, the FSB agent wantedPoison the Armed Forces Command in Zaporozhye. He is threatened with life imprisonment.
title: “You need to come to the UAZ without letters“ z ”because no one wants to ride with you” - Gur cross -country
description: The Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about it. ...
author: Army Inform
